'''Isaac Patel''' was in the hospital for a ventricular reduction to treat his enlarged heart.

==History==
===Heart Surgery===
Isaac was in the hospital to have a ventricular reduction to fix the problem with his heart. It was a riskier option than an L-VAD, but [[Craig Thomas]] was sure he could do it. The surgery was successful, meaning that he didn't have to spend time on an LVAD waiting for a heart transplant that might not come.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Isaac has a large family. Several of them, including [[Rina Patel|Rina]], [[Tina Patel|Tina]], and [[Chuckie Patel|Chuckie]] came to visit him in the hospital.

==Notes and Trivia==
*His favorite food is tater tot hot dishes. Both Rina and Tina brought him some while he was in the hospital and they were disappointed that he couldn't eat any of it.
